name: @THETIMEINC/uiflow
description: uiflow - the simplest way to write down your ui-flow diagram like markdown

scripts.uiflows: ./bin/uiflow -i files/uiflows/connec.txt -o files/uiflows/connec.png -f png && ./bin/uiflow -i files/uiflows/connec.txt -o files/uiflows/connec.svg -f svg

author: hirokidaichi
